alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, central Upson and northeastern Talbot Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Sprewell Bluff State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Thomaston, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Manchester, Woodland, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, Po Biddy Crossroads, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Pleasant Hill, Sunnyside, Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma and Hannahs Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
